name: topographic-plugins-official
description: Official Topographic plugins for Claude Code - development CLI, GitHub workflows, and product design

plugins.name: dev
plugins.description: Development CLI skills and GitHub workflows - Docker, Vercel, Railway, Neon, deployment platforms, and automated Git/GitHub workflows for commits, PRs, worktrees, and branch management

plugins.name: product
plugins.description: Product design and management tools for building user-centric products

plugins.name: web-crawler
plugins.description: High-performance Rust web crawler with stealth mode, LLM-ready Markdown export, multi-format output, sitemap discovery, and robots.txt support
